H0.text: Which Scottish football team plays home games at Easter Road. Hearts

H1.text: Which Scottish football team plays home games at Easter Road. Celtic

H2.text: Which Scottish football team plays home games at Easter Road. Rangers

H3.text: Which Scottish football team plays home games at Easter Road. HIBERNIAN

A4.text: Hibs obtained a lease on a site that is now known as Easter Road in 1892 and have played their home matches there since February 1893.

A5.text: Home matches are played at Easter Road, which has been in use since 1893, when the club joined the Scottish Football League.
